reporting-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs

title.narrative: OCHA Headquarter, Operations and Advocacy - New York

description.narrative: OCHA’s public and private advocacy raises awareness of forgotten crises, promotes respect for international humanitarian law (IHL), brings the voices of crisis-affected people to the forefront, and helps people obtain access to humanitarian assistance.
